data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iqwadPIsYSEQ7kNvgFk5loy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AwhB08kQpyXNWbVJyh1-6Mq&oh=00_AYAYZllBUIL3HWvB0NNFBszGMY9jr32dYt71PQ0GR9r4dw&oe=66AF6437)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TNxv9oB5eI8Q7kNvgGooB0z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AwhB08kQpyXNWbVJyh1-6Mq&oh=00_AYBdooBp6j9E2_I4fGb1NO0qHigFRVF1GiVAgYEaACDF4g&oe=66AF71D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DxKB1YZytNUQ7kNvgFxf8Zx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AwhB08kQpyXNWbVJyh1-6Mq&oh=00_AYB3lIK8z9W-txdh5GuY3g7i_mN4lavVtllnhQP8lQg11w&oe=66AF5D09)
